properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , EMAIL , PWD , NAME , NICKNAME , GENDER , USER_FILE_RENAME , BIRTH , POST_CODE , ADDRESS , PHONE , JOIN_DATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND EMAIL = ? AND PWD = ?
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USER_NO , EMAIL , PWD , NAME , NICKNAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE ADMIN = 'U'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , M.* FROM ( SELECT USER_NO , EMAIL , NAME , NICKNAME , GENDER , BIRTH , POST_CODE , ADDRESS , PHONE , JOIN_DATE , USER_STATUS , ADMIN FROM MEMBER ORDER BY JOIN_DATE DESC ) M ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
